NK041(di)013:1: // rab gnas yon bsgo'i gtong thun snying por dril ba bzhugs so //
NK041(di)013:3: rab gnas yon bsgo'i gtong thun nyung ngur brjod /
NK041(di)013:4: de yang sbyin pa'i bdag po khyed kyis lhag pa'i
NK041(di)013:5: bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam par dag pas bde
NK041(di)013:8: thugs kyi rten phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs shing rab
NK041(di)013:9: tu gnas par gsol ba 'di ni dge legs kyi
NK041(di)013:11: spyir lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag gi
NK041(di)013:12: phan pa dang bde ba ni rgyal ba'i bstan pa
NK041(di)013:13: kho na la rag las shing /
NK041(di)013:14: de yang dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la rag las pa dang /
NK041(di)013:15: khyad par bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung
NK041(di)013:16: thugs kyi phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs nas gdul bya
NK041(di)013:17: thun mong pa rnams la yang dbang po'i mngon sum
NK041(di)013:18: du snang bas bsod nams kyi zhing brten sla ba'i
NK041(di)013:19: phyir de dag sgrub tshul dang /
NK041(di)013:20: bsgrubs pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig mdo rgyud du ma nas gsungs pa yin te /
NK041(di)013:21: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las /
NK041(di)013:22: la las de nyid rin chen sna bdun dang //
NK041(di)013:23: la las de bzhin zangs dang 'khar ba las //
NK041(di)013:24: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas na //
NK041(di)013:25: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK041(di)013:27: gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa las /
NK041(di)013:28: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang ni //
NK041(di)013:29: sku gzugs rnams la rdul phran ci song ba //
NK041(di)013:30: de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyis //
NK041(di)013:31: lha yul sa steng nges par rgyal srid thob //
NK041(di)013:32: gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin //
NK041(di)013:33: phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas //
NK041(di)013:34: tha mar skye dang rga la sogs pa yi //
NK041(di)013:35: sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang thob //
NK041(di)013:38: sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas //
NK041(di)013:39: rnam grol rim pa thob 'gyur na //
NK041(di)013:40: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pas //
NK041(di)013:41: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK041(di)013:42: zhes sogs phan yon rgya cher gsungs pa la yid
NK041(di)013:43: ches kyis bsgrub pa'i rten de yang zhal bsro ba
NK041(di)013:45: byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba dge zhing bkra shis par byed pa la /
NK041(di)013:46: pra tish+tha bi d+hi zhes rab gnas kyi cho gar yongs su grags pa ste /
NK041(di)013:48: sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la //
NK041(di)013:49: ye shes gzhug pa'i byin rlabs can //
NK041(di)013:50: 'khor ba byung ba lnga yi gzugs //
NK041(di)013:51: sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid yin //
NK041(di)013:54: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la //
NK041(di)013:55: mtha' yas grol ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
NK041(di)013:56: rgyal ba dgug dang gzhug par bya //
NK041(di)013:57: zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar bsgrub pa la /
NK041(di)013:58: shes byed kyi gzhi bshad pa dang /
NK041(di)013:59: bshad pa'i cho ga ji ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul gnyis su gnas pa las /
NK041(di)013:66: gang gi tshe bya ba'i dus /
NK041(di)013:67: gang bya ba'i cho ga dang bdun gyi sgo nas
NK041(di)013:68: blang dor gyi dmigs phye ste phun sum tshogs par
NK041(di)013:69: bya dgos pa rnams tshang ba'i dbang du byas nas
NK041(di)013:70: / gnyis pa ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga la
NK041(di)013:71: yang rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i rnam bzhag 'ga' yod pa
NK041(di)013:72: las cung zad bsdus pa nyin chog gi dbang du
NK041(di)013:73: / byas pa la / sbyor ba yo byad kyi bsham dang /
NK041(di)013:74: bdag bskyed bum bzlas dang bcas pa sogs sngon du btang nas /
NK041(di)013:75: rab gnas dngos kyi cho ga la /
NK041(di)013:76: bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bskrad la /
NK041(di)013:77: mi shes pa dang sdig pa sbyong bas bkru zhing phyi ba rnams kyis nyes pa'i skyon bsal nas /
NK041(di)013:78: dngos gzhi gsol ba gdab cing sems bskyed nas gnas
NK041(di)013:79: bya'i rten rigs dang mthun pa'i dam tshig par bskyed
NK041(di)013:80: la / ye shes pa spyan drangs te dgug gzhug bcing ba dang /
NK041(di)013:81: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum
NK041(di)013:82: dang gnas bya'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum dbyer
NK041(di)013:83: med du rgyas gdab pa dang /
NK041(di)013:84: gdan gsum tshang ba'i lha rnams spyan drangs te dbang
NK041(di)013:85: bskur bas go 'phang gi chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i
NK041(di)013:86: nus pa can du bsgrubs nas mchod pa dang /
NK041(di)013:87: spyan sogs dbang po'i skyon bsal bas ye shes kyi
NK041(di)013:88: gzigs pa gdul bya'i yul la 'jug pa'i rten 'brel
NK041(di)013:89: bsgrigs te / rigs dang mthun pa'i rten bskyed pa
NK041(di)013:90: de nyid gnas bya ji ltar yod pa so so'i
NK041(di)013:91: skur bsgyur ba rnams kyis yon tan mngon par bsgrub
NK041(di)013:92: bsgrigs te / pa ste / de ltar rten ye
NK041(di)013:93: shes pa'i ngo bor gyur pa de la spyir mchod
NK041(di)013:94: bsgrigs te / pa ste / bstod dang / bye brag nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad dang /
NK041(di)013:96: rab gnas kyi sngags dang bkra shis kyiis mnga' dbul ba ste /
NK041(di)013:97: mnga' dbul ba rnam pa bzhir grags pas mnga' gsol ba dang /
NK041(di)013:98: de nyid gdul bya'i dpal mgon du 'khor ba ji srid brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
NK041(di)013:99: brtan par byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyis phun sum
NK041(di)013:100: tshogs pa'i dpal spel ba ste dngos gzhi'i cho ga'o
NK041(di)013:101: // rjes kyi cho ga la 'jig rten pa'i gtor ma bsngo ba /
NK041(di)013:102: srung ma bsgo ba la sogs pa rnams legs par song nas /
NK041(di)013:103: 'dir yon bdag bsgo ba zhes bya ba de'i skabs su babs pa yin /
NK041(di)013:104: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
NK041(di)013:105: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
NK041(di)013:107: ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa rgyun mi chad par gyis shig /
NK041(di)013:108: ces bsgos pa bzhin du khyed kyis kyang dang du
NK041(di)013:109: blang ba'i tshul du 'di ltar bshams pa'i mchod pa
NK041(di)013:110: 'dis mtshon dus gsum dge tshogs dang bcas pa'i phyi
NK041(di)013:111: nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin rab 'byams su spel ba
NK041(di)013:112: 'dus tshogs dang lhan cig pas zhal bsro'i tshul du
NK041(di)013:113: 'bul bar mdzod / rab 'byams rgya mtsho dpag med na //
NK041(di)013:115: de ltar zhal bsro'i mchod pa phul nas bkra shis pa'i stan la 'khod pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK041(di)013:116: bkra shis kyi bgegs bsal phyir /
NK041(di)013:118: rje btsun rtsa ba dang sogs kyi bden stobs brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)013:119: 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs shig sogs drag sngags spos rol bya /
NK041(di)013:121: stong pa'i ngang las sbyin pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bskyed nas /
NK041(di)013:123: stong pa'i ngang las m+aam las sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK041(di)013:125: sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub
NK041(di)013:126: pa la gzugs kyi lha mo 'od 'chang mas me
NK041(di)013:127: long phul ba bkra shis pa'i rdzas su byin gyis
NK041(di)013:128: brlabs pa de bzhin du deng 'dir yang rab tu
NK041(di)013:129: gnas pa legs par byas pa'i rten 'di dang bdag
NK041(di)013:130: dang sbyin pa'i bdag pos thog drangs nam mkha' dang
NK041(di)013:131: mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad me long gi rdzas
NK041(di)013:132: la brten nas bkra shis par gyur cig /
NK041(di)013:133: me long ye shes rgya mtsho chen po yis //
NK041(di)013:135: de bzhin du glang po che sa srung gis sman gi wam /
NK041(di)013:136: zhing pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas zho //
NK041(di)013:138: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dung dkar po g.yas su 'khyil ba /
NK041(di)013:139: sa yi lha mo brtan mas li khri /
NK041(di)013:140: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes yungs kar
NK041(di)013:141: phul ba sogs dang tshigs bcad so so'i mthar 'jam
NK041(di)013:142: rol me tog gi char dbab pa sogs byas nas
NK041(di)013:143: / rten mchod pa sogs smon lam gdab cing yon
NK041(di)013:144: bdag gis rten la bskor ba dang phyag bya ba
NK041(di)013:145: sogs dge legs kyis khyab par bya ba yin no
NK041(di)013:146: / // tshul 'di nyin chog dkyus ma sogs //
NK041(di)013:147: ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga la //
NK041(di)013:148: rgyas bsdus skabs su gang bab pa //
NK041(di)013:149: de dang mthun par bya ba gces /
